DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether position change colonoscope withdrawal affect polyp detection rate . We hypothesize position change scope withdrawal increase polyp detection rate .
DOC.brief_title: Position Changes During Colonoscope Withdrawal Polyp Detection
DOC.criteria: Outpatients undergo colonoscopy Age 40 great Inpatient colonoscopy Unable provide inform consent Unable complete colonoscopy cecum Previous bowel resection , inflammatory bowel disease , polyposis syndrome Musculoskeletal disorder mobility issue limit effective patient position change Inadequate bowel preparation
